title: Movie Mania
headline: The Movie Mania Project
description: The Movie Mania Project was the Front-End Project in the Full-Stack Bootcamp. It was a group Work with a group of four People. We worked with ReactJS and CSS. In adition to the Frontend Part I added an Google Login and linked an Database to the Page so you can save you Favorites. To get the Data we used the MovieDB API.

title: Weather APP
headline: The WeatherApp Project
description: The WeatherApp Project was an Frontend Only Project. We worked with HTML, CSS and Javascript. To get the Data we used the Open Weather API.

title: PokéDex
headline: The PokéDex Project
description: The PokéDex Project was an Frontend Only Project in the Full-Stack Bootcamp. It was a group Work with a group of four People. We worked with ReactJS and CSS. To get the Data we used the Pokemon API.
